text: it may need a bit of fine tuning - but the x factor usa has helped simon cowell 's tv company make astonishing profits of # 32.6 million -lrb- $ 52.4 -rrb- , it has been revealed . the 53-year-old music mogul 's tv production business , simco , was boosted by 138 per cent last year , mainly due to the launch of the fox tv talent show . cowell 's company also reported that total turnover almost doubled to # 54.6 m -lrb- $ 87.89 m -rrb- in the year to 31 march 2012 . rich : the launch of the x factor usa has helped simon cowell -
